prompt: Run /solopreneur:kickoff Discovery Sprint on AI-powered recipe generator
expected_behaviors: Identifies Discovery Sprint team|Assembles Researcher + BizOps + Engineer|Presents team composition to CEO for approval|Creates agent team with shared task list
Identifies ad-hoc team with Engineer and QA|Does not include other agents unless requested|Presents team to CEO for approval

prompt: Get the team together to brainstorm this idea from all angles
expected_behaviors: Routes to kickoff|Infers Discovery Sprint team|Proposes collaborative exploration

expected_behaviors: Routes to kickoff|Infers Build & QA team|Proposes competing hypotheses approach

prompt: Run /solopreneur:kickoff just with @researcher on market trends
expected_behaviors: Works with single teammate|Still creates agent team structure|Runs and compiles results

expected_behaviors: Team name not predefined|Proposes best-fit team composition|Asks CEO to confirm
Does not route to kickoff|This is implementation work for /build or /sprint
